column1: Leo Lion and Tranquil Forest, Create a tranquil scene of a relaxed Leo lion made from mesh, highly detailed, blue gradient neon light outline, high quality, ultra sharp resolution.

Tiger and Mighty Mountain, Create an awe-inspiring scene of a mighty tiger made from mesh, highly detailed, red gradient neon light outline, high quality, ultra sharp resolution, on top of a mountain peak overlooking a valley.

Black Panther and Vibrant Jungle, Create a vibrant scene of an alert black panther made from mesh, highly detailed, green gradient neon light outline, high quality, ultra sharp resolution, prowling through a lush jungle environment.
